channel.title: Animesh Chaturvedi on Data Day(s) 2021
channel.description: Recent content in Animesh Chaturvedi on Data Day(s) 2021

item.title: Large scale data ingestion using Istio/Envoy
item.description: This talk will share the experience of building a data lake using Istio / Envoy. This talk will cover why we selected Istio for building a data lake in early 2019. Our journey with Istio and go in depth the challenges we ran into scaling the ingestion pipeline to scale to process several hundred tera bytes a day.
